channel.title: RuneScape Lottery Pot
channel.description:
[center]You can Comment below on how much you want to add into the pot I will use Random.org to pick the winner The winner will receive the Pot Money
Rules: -You can only enter once -You cannot edit your number (if I see a edit I will not count that post) -You cannot pick the same number as someone else -You will need atleast to add 100k to the pot to enter -You have to pick a number from 1-500
[size=16pt]Current Pot: 3.4m[/size] 200k from Me to start of with :) 3.2m Wet Dreamss
Numbers: Wet Dreamss: 24 [/center]

item.title: RuneScape Lottery Pot
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This should be made as an irc bot, run through the mopar irc net. This way the decision can be made live in front of everyone in the channel, and there can’t be any bias. A single trusted member can be used as the middleman, and the trades can be completely silent on RuneScape. All money must be given in advance. Might have to think up a decent system for actually registering numbers with the bot (I have a few ideas, will pass them along to David and zyle if they remind me).

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Lottery Pot
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:30, topic:424559”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=527216.msg3842971#msg3842971 date=1323390643]
Put me at the top of the list, since i donated 3.2m also a final rep from somebody so i can have 200 would be awesome <3

Edit: Success. A tad over 1 month and 200 repp ^.^ (record? i think yes.) Thanks to Kozs
[/quote]Someone needs a rep reset for asking for rep I see

OT - Looks decent zyle, but where exactly do you place a bet? And blitz did you read my previous post? You should set an exact entry fee, so people aren’t just guessing and not contributing. It needs to be a more refined system.[/quote]

I was trying to figure that part out. Because if I add it to the client, then how will the holder collect the amount? Suddenly we have have 100 entries, each with 1m bets, and no one has given any money to anyone.

I was thinking about adding a button to the client where you can submit your entry, your name gets added to a queue, and the queue is available to the pot holders (different time zones, etc). Then, when one of the holders is online, they meet the entrant in game, get the money, and keep it until the day of the drawing(or whatever), give it to the head person, and then they give it to the winner.

Although, this still isn’t really a lottery system; it’s more of a raffle. In a lottery system, each person pays a fixed price (ie. $1 at the grocery store), and they get a ticket. Every week, the numbers are drawn, and whoever has those exact numbers wins. It relies on people not winning, so that the pot can build up.

Read full topic
